text: @mkraju @evolv67 Will the head of the US Coronavirus Taskforce Mike Pence and the Coronavirus Taskforce chief aide and purchasing agent, Jared Kushner be there?  Because, if they're not Speaker Pelosi, then it's just another exercise in futility.
